item.title: ðŸ™Œ
item.description: Intentions I want to feel better about things at work Do not overthink Treat time wisely Learn things before its too late Happenings How I envision work is completely different from what I get. Its not the work itself but my stupid and unreal expectations. Its mentally painful. I wish to be happy every day after work. I wish to wake up excited for work everyday. Work is not what I thought of when I was studying my bachelors.
